price: ߌ ߘߟߊߥߊ߬ߦߌ߲߫ ߝߌ߲߬ߟߊ߲߬ߞߊߝߏ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ ߘߌߡߌ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߠߋ߫ ߛߌ߰ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
